product.longDescription: Each leaf shows beautiful color contrast between red, green, and yellow, making it a gorgeous addition to salad mix. A true mini, Rubygo holds its compact frame even after it matures. Ideal for sandwiches, as leaves are thick with a crunchy texture and excellent flavor. Great for salad mix and whole-head sales. Makes a perfect pair with Verigo. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–27, 30–32 and Nasonovia ribisnigri aphid; and intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. Avg. 302,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 25 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Slow-bolting, flavorful one-cut red leaf. Conventional seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.

  • Product Notes: <span style="" >Many (though not all) of our pelleted lettuce varieties are primed to increase germination uniformity, and to break thermal and/or light dormancy. However, the priming process decreases the storage life of the seed, so pelleted seed must be kept cool and dry prior to planting, and should be used within one year of purchase.</span>
